mapper.insert: insert into wj_record ( cr_date, amount, type, remark, safty_cost_fee, cardno, bank) values ( #{now}, #{amount}, #{type}, #{remark}, #{safty_cost_fee}, #{cardno}, #{bank} ) SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: update wj_credit set remaining_credit = remaining_credit - #{amount}, remaining_credit_percentage = ROUND(remaining_credit/total_credit*100,1) where 1=1 and no = #{cardno}
update wj_financial_information set next_day_arrival = next_day_arrival + #{amount} -#{safty_cost_fee} where 1=1

update wj_bank set remaining_credit = remaining_credit - #{amount}, pre_bill_amount = pre_bill_amount+#{amount}, remaining_credit_percentage = ROUND(remaining_credit/total_credit*100,1) where 1=1 and code = #{bank}

update wj_bank set remaining_credit = remaining_credit + #{amount}, pre_bill_amount = pre_bill_amount-#{amount}, remaining_credit_percentage = ROUND(remaining_credit/total_credit*100,1) where 1=1 and code = #{bank}
update wj_record set cancel = '1', cancel_at = now() where 1=1 and id = #{id}
update wj_bank set bill_amount = #{bill_amount}, remaining_credit = #{remaining_credit}, pre_bill_amount = #{pre_bill_amount} where 1=1 and code = #{current_bank}

update wj_bank set remaining_credit = remaining_credit - #{amount}, touch_date = now(), remaining_credit_percentage = ROUND(remaining_credit/total_credit*100,1) where 1=1 and code = (select distinct(type) from wj_credit where no=#{cardno})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM wj_credit where type = #{bank} ORDER BY temporary_credit desc
